name: ext_R3_ImmunizationRecommendation_recommendation
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecommendation|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` maps to R4 `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
